#summary Compiling
= How to compile P3DFFT =
|| *Flags* || *Description* ||
|| --enable-single || compiles P3DFFT in single-precision ||
|| --enable-fftw || enables the use of the FFTW library ||
|| --with-fftw=<path to FFTW3 library> || path to FFTW library ||
|| FCFLAGS=<Fortran compiler flags> || flags to use with Fortran compiler || 
|| CFLAGS=<C compiler flags> || flags to use with C compiler ||
|| LDFLAGS=<libraries to link> || additional linker flags ||

=== Compiling on Triton ===

|| *Compiler* || *Modules* || *Arguments* ||
|| PGI || pgi, fftw, mpi || ./configure --enable-pgi --with-fftw="$FFTWHOME" FCFLAGS="-fastsse -tp barcelona-64 -Mextend -byteswapio" CFLAGS="-fastsse -tp barcelona-64" LDFLAGS="-lmpi_f90 -lmpi_f77 -pgf90libs -lmyriexpress" ||
|| Intel || intel, fftw, mpi || ./configure --enable-intel --enable-dstride1 --with-fftw="$FFTWHOME" FCFLAGS="-O3 -xW -132 -fpp" CFLAGS="-O3 -xW" LDFLAGS="-lmpi_f90 -lmpi_f77 -lmyriexpress" || GCC || gnu, fftw, mpi || ./configure --enable-gcc --with-fftw="$FFTWHOME" LDFLAGS="-lmpi_f90 -lmpi_f77" || 


=== How to compile on TACC for PGI ===
_Note: You must load the module fftw3 first!_

./configure --enable-pgi="yes" --with-fftw="$TACC_FFTW3_DIR" FCFLAGS="-fastsse -tp barcelona-64 -Mextend -byteswapio" CFLAGS="-fastsse -tp barcelona-64" LDFLAGS="-pgf90libs" 

=== How to compile on Kraken for PGI ===
_Note: You must load the module fftw first!_

./configure --enable-fftw --with-fftw="$FFTW_DIR/.." --enable-useeven --enable-stride1 --enable-pgi FC=ftn FCFLAGS="-fastsse -tp istanbul-64 -Mextend -byteswapio"  CC=cc CFLAGS="-fastsse -tp istanbul-64"
